Project Proponent: S & R McDonald Pty Ltd as the Trustee for McDonald & Sons Family Trust
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Human-Induced Regeneration of a Permanent Even-Aged Native Forest - 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013
Project Description: This project establishes permanent native forests through assisted regeneration from in-situ seed sources (including rootstock and lignotubers) on land that was cleared of vegetation and where regrowth was suppressed for at least 10 years prior to the project having commenced.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
1/SP125289, 13/BUR41



This project is in the Murweh local government area.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: Jason Hugh Knight and Benjamin Page Knight as the Trustees for Knight Pastoral; S & R McDonald Pty Ltd as the Trustee for McDonald & Sons Family Trust
Name of person/s to whom the NKACCUs iss: Jason Hugh Knight and Benjamin Page Knight as the Trustees for Knight Pastoral
Notes: 12/12/2017 Variation to participant name - from Jason Hugh Knight and Benjamin Page Knight as the Trustees for Knight Pastoral to S & R McDonald Pty Ltd as the Trustee for McDonald & Sons Family Trust.
